01: could not get screen sizes
02: could not load textures


async def CommunicationRequest(reciever):
    status = reciever.sendSignalMessage("Feletonieren?)
    await reciever.response.response() =>{
        if "Ja" in reciever.response => () {
            phone.StartCall(reciever)
        }
        else{
            return Nein => {
                sendSignalmessage(reciever, "ok)
            }
        }
    }
